name: Killer Spectre
description:
You are a spectre, you have to possess people to kill everybody without getting caught by the cops...

When you go inside somone's body its soul comes out, to get out of a person's body you have to put its soul back in...

When you kill you have to hide the corpses (they will automaticly follow you) or the cops will kill you, you can hide the corpses in chests...

If you din't hide the corpses before getting out of a body the owner will have to hide the dead bodies himself or get killed by the cops...
